name: Young Joni

name: Great River Water Park
reviews:
Loved taking my kid here. Swim up bar for Adults.

name: Minnesota Valley National Wildlife Refuge
reviews: We went here today, near the Old Cedar bridge. It wasn't empty, but people were keeping safe distances away from each other. It was clean and had a bike...

It is my backyard
Of course I love this great place
Wildlife galore

Been here almost two years now. Miles of hiking trails that I have yet to explore. It...
Beautiful place to hike and walk the dogs. I love coming here, it's secluded and feels very private. Great place to also fish if you're looking for a spot.

name: Urban Growler
reviews:
Urban Growler has a great selection of beers - something for everybody as well as interesting seasonal options.

name: Battle Creek Regional Park
reviews: Has to be the best park in the Twin Cities for a spirited hike.  Lot's of elevation (at least for St. Paul, so you can get a great workout sprinting around...

name: Voxel Virtual Reality Parlour
reviews:

name: Caponi Art Park

name: Real Ghost Tours
reviews:
Dumb waste of time and money. Not even fake scary.

It's more of a walk through basements with a history lesson.
Total crap!  A huge waste of time and money.  The Staff was uninformed and lame.

name: Lake of the Isles
reviews: Nice place to walk 2.85 miles around the lake very beautiful houses, good place for a family walk or a couples walk to enjoy the weather together!!!

True...
